name: neo4j-replica
description: Neo4j is an open source Graph Database. It allows you to efficiently manage highly connected data. This DC/OS package is about the Neo4j read replica servers, read replicas act like caches for the data that the core servers safeguard. You can access the cluster via officially supported drivers from most languages. Installation documentation can be found at https://github.com/dcos/examples/tree/master/1.8/neo4j
preInstallNotes: The default configuration requires at least 2 nodes having 2 CPU, 4GB of memory and 8GB of persistent disk storage in total. This DC/OS Service is currently EXPERIMENTAL. There may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation, or other discrepancies. Default credentials are neo4j/dcos. Please change them on first use.
postInstallNotes:
Neo4j has been successfully installed.
Documentation can be found at https://neo4j.com/docs and https://neo4j.com/developer
